subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Both Bayern Munich and Dortmund are legitimate powers in Europe, but Manchester United proved that other teams, like Leverkusen, are more than vulnerable in its 5-0 victory.
snippet: Both Bayern Munich and Dortmund are legitimate powers in Europe, but Manchester United proved that other teams, like Leverkusen, are more than vulnerable in its 5-0 victory.
